We are searching for a Magento Development Specialist. In this role, you will take a commanding presence within the ecommerce area and be responsible for the functionality, development, support, and optimization of Gigya modules inside the Magento platform.
You will work closely with team members in Data, Web Development, IT, and Product with the goal of maintaining a highly-performant, highly-optimized tech environment that drives sales performance for ecommerce websites. This is a full-time role based in our offices in Azrieli Center, Tel Aviv.
Responsibilities:
– A great team player who is able to interact effectively with people in all levels of the organization.
– Lead and own feature and platform development processes while ensuring adherence to best practices.
– Produce a reliable, stable, up-to-date, high performance E-Commerce environment.
– Effectively translate requirements and customer experience needs into concrete and meaningful information for the business and functional assets in the e-commerce space.
– Work with product managers and leadership in defining, scoping and scheduling feature development.
– Add value to technology and business process related projects as a key stakeholder and contributor.
– Ability to easily demonstrate key technology and testing processes to technical and non-technical users.
– Able to develop, maintain, and measure process improvements pertaining to both the technology and the business environment (i.e., simplified checkout, page speed).
Requirements:
– 5+ years Magento development and implementation experience.
– Implement and customize Magento extensions and develop custom Magento extensions for both CE and EE.
– Proficiency in developing, debugging and optimizing complex PHP web applications.
– 5+ years with PHP, MySQL, CSS, HTML5, JavaScript development.
– Experience using PHP to create and consume web services (SOAP, REST) and/or other experience implementing data integrations within the platform a plus.
– Strong understanding of Zend’s underlying architecture, including the implications and challenges presented by the framework Magento is built upon.
– Strong knowledge of Magento’s ORM architecture including simple models and Magento’s unique implementation of EAV.
– Prior experience in building custom Magento modules. Blocks, Observers, Controllers, Models, Helpers, and SQL updates are all 2nd nature.

As an architect, you’ll be part of a small team that is involved in brainstorming, designing and sometimes implementing, the company’s more challenging technical requirements. You’ll be expected to know the product inside-out, be familiar with many different technologies form different domains (web, native mobile, server backend). You’ll need to work with the development teams, be sharp, creative and with good people skills.
Responsibilities:

– You will be able to identify all of the source, tools, environment, and other components that make up a particular release
– You will research and integrate new technologies into our stack
– You will initiate and push DevOps improvements, enhancements and automation
– You will assist in the architectural integrity of our products and identify problematic areas in the current implementations
– You will assist in the continuous improvement of our development methodologies
– You will enhance our framework for development and deployment processes
Requirements:
– Experience in a similar role
– Minimum 3 years of experience in architecture of web-based applications.
